HappyThoughts.thought: "I'm happy being myself, which I've never been before. I always hid in other people, or tried to find myself through the characters, or live out their lives, but I didn't have those things in mine."
"If you can do what you do best and be happy, you're further along in life than most people."
"The best part about being with a group is that you don't have to do everything alone. You're with your friends."
"Learning how to die is therefore learning how to live."
